Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the marriage was bona fide
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Doubts due to inconsistencies in family disclosures
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section related to misrepresentation and bona fide relationships
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Two-pronged test: genuineness and purpose of marriage
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to analyze relationship history and supporting evidence
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to properly apply the legal test for marriage genuineness
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Remitted for redetermination by a differently constituted panel
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Couple's shared financial situation, cohabitation, knowledge of each other
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Error in law regarding marriage genuineness
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: R2(1), R40(1) IRPR – Bona fide relationship and misrepresentation
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspicions of contrived marriage for immigration benefit
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of reasoning on key factors supporting genuineness
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to IAD’s application of legal test

Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Involved: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act – Duty of disclosure
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Unfair assessment based on omission without prejudice evaluation
Crimes.Legal_Framework: Canadian immigration law and procedural fairness
Crimes.Institutional_Action: Denial of sponsorship by visa officer and IAD
Crimes.Nature_of_Participation: Principal applicant in family class sponsorship
Crimes.Temporal_Context: Time of visa application and appeal
Crimes.Geographic_Context: International (applicant abroad seeking entry to Canada)
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness and fairness in evaluating omissions
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Overemphasis on minor omission without holistic assessment
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Procedural fairness and materiality of omissions
Crimes.Enforcement_Action: Visa denial and dismissal of appeal
Crimes.Victim_Basis: Applicant denied right to fair hearing
